pr_title: Use the new ocamllint semgrep rules and fix warnings

timeline.message:
Use the new ocamllint semgrep rules and fix warnings

Dogfood!

test plan:
make test
make check

timeline.bodyText: At some point I would rather like use --config https://semgrep.dev/r/ocaml but I could not find a way to create an ocaml ruleset, so I've created a policy and downloaded the corresponding yaml file.
timeline.author: aryx

timeline.message: * semgrep.yml: remove rules now in semgrep-rules/
